response.overview: Hot new star Valentine is the girl with the silver tongue, slickest in the west. The only access to her and to Valentine's is through a large mirror in Cricket's apartment. Shanna McCullough and Marie find the access and enter a Wonderland of white rabbits (Cumisha Amado and Sheena), a dragon, and of course, Valentine, who has created a clubhouse of sensual pleasure, including every form of girl/girl action.
response.title: Valentine's Wonderland
